ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:99}); // {Cloud}
“The cycle of nature and your
stupid plan don't mean a thing.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:100}); // {Cloud}
“{Aeris} is gone.”{PAUSE}“{Aeris} will no longer talk,
no longer laugh, cry…or get angry…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:101}); // {Cloud}
“What about us…what are WE supposed to do?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:103}); // {Cloud}
“My fingers are tingling.
My mouth is dry.
My eyes are burning!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:105}); // {Cloud}
“Of course!
What do you think I am!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:96}); // Sephiroth
“Do not worry.
Soon the girl will become
part of the Planet's energy.”{PAUSE}“All that is left is to go North.
The 'Promised Land' waits
for me over the snowy fields.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:97}); // Sephiroth
“There, I will become a new being
by uniting with the Planet.
As will this girl……”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:104}); // Sephiroth
“What are you saying?
Are you trying to tell me
you have feelings now?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:106}); // Sephiroth
“Ha, ha, ha…
Stop acting as if you're sad.”{PAUSE}“And there's no need to act as if
you're angry either.”
fade({r:250, g:250, b:250, speed:128, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:250, g:250, b:250, speed:64, type:5, adjust:255});
fade({r:0, g:250, b:0, speed:128, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:250, b:0, speed:64, type:5, adjust:255});
fade({r:250, g:250, b:250, speed:128, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:250, g:250, b:250, speed:64, type:5, adjust:255});
fade({r:0, g:250, b:0, speed:128, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:250, b:0, speed:64, type:5, adjust:255});

fade({r:250, g:0, b:0, speed:16, type:5, adjust:255});

dialogStrings:
You cannot take on any more Materia.
Please discard some Materia.

[Save Point]
Access the Menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.

{Tifa}
“It gets harder from here!
Follow me!”

“I'm all right.
You be careful too, Guide.”

Sephiroth
“Everyone seems to be all right.
Will we be able to get back?”

{Tifa}
“These caves are intertwined,
like an ant farm…”{PAUSE}“Oh, and Sephiroth…
One person seems to be missing…”

Sephiroth
“It may sound cruel,
but we've no time to search for him.
We can't go back, so we must go on.
We'll travel together from here.”

“Welcome to Bone Village,
a town for nature lovers.”

“What do you want?”
Where is the City of the Ancients?
Do you know where {Aeris} is?
What are you doing?

“What do you want?”
Have you seen Sephiroth?
What are you doing?

“Oh, the man in a black cape.
He was looking for the Temple of the Ancients.”
The Temple of the Ancients?
Thanks

“It's way down south.
It's on the other side of
this town and the inland sea.”{PAUSE}“It's the pyramid rising out of the forest.”
How do you get in?
That's enough

“You'll need the Keystone.”
What's a Keystone?
Oh, yeah, I know

“Just like it sounds.
A rock that's a key.
I heard that some rich guy has it.”

“You need something?”
Are you going to run away??
What are you doing?

“Through fossils, we already know
everything that happened
on this Planet since the beginning.”{PAUSE}“Now, we want to see the rest
on to the end of the Planet…
It's a mixed feeling…”

“The City of the Ancients?
Oh, you must mean the Forgotten City.”

“Are you talking about that girl?
I warned her, but she went into the
{CYAN}Sleeping Forest{WHITE} anyway.”

“Excavating is great.
It's like a history of the
Planet told in the land.”

“This town's motto is not to think
about anything.”{PAUSE}“Just live.
Eat, work, and sleep.”{PAUSE}“It's pretty hard not to
think about anything.”

“Want to buy something?”
I want the Lunar Harp
Don't want anything

“The Lunar Harp is somewhere in the ground here.
We could excavate it for you if you want us to.”
Start diggin'
I want to buy something
Not right now

“Other than the Lunar Harp,
What else do you want us to dig for?”
Lunar Harp
Good treasure
Normal treasure

“All right! Then I'll lend you some of my staff.
Show us where you want us to dig!”

“Everything already excavated is in
the box next to the tent.”

“The memory of this planet is buried
layer by layer in this geological stratum.
Kind of romantic, don't you think?”

“The forest just beyond here
is called the {CYAN}Sleeping Forest{WHITE}.
Right now the forest is asleep.
Anyone who wanders in while
it's asleep, gets confused.
You can go in, but you may never come out…”

“But just now, a girl in pink
and a man in a black cape went in.
You think they'll be all right?”

“You can awaken the {CYAN}Sleeping Forest{WHITE}
if you have the Lunar Harp.”{PAUSE}“Once awake, they say the forest
will open a road for you.”

“The girl in pink who just went in also
used a Lunar Harp to get through.”
I want a Lunar Harp
Not interested
“Ask the guy in the tent below.”

“We use the newest system
to find buried treasure.
We use bombs to make earthquakes,
and then check the sound waves
given off by the tremors.”

“If you learn the special qualities
of the animals in the (Old Forest),
there'll be nothing to fear.
Do you want to hear more?”
{CHOICE} Yeah, tell me
{CHOICE} Not now

“What do you want to know?”
{CHOICE} About Pitcher Plants
{CHOICE} About Scent Balls
{CHOICE} About
{CHOICE} About Inchworms

“It's a strange plant that hangs
down from above.
It's mouth is usually open
to catch insects.”{PAUSE}“When an insect gets in,
it closes its mouth, trapping it.
It's lid's stronger than
it looks.
It's big enough to
hold a human.
But it's really picky and
spits out lots of stuff.”

“Be really cautious with this flower.
It'll snap at anything.
If you're going to go through here…
do it the instant it has its mouth closed.”

“It may not look it…or maybe it does,
but this insect is really timid.
If you go near it, it'll run away…
If you touch it, it'll just turn in to a ball…”

“Excavating is a slow process.
The treasures we excavate are stored
in the box next to the tent.
Remember that.”

“Just a while ago, a young girl
asked me the same things.”

“Then the entrance to the forest made
a funny sound, like 'Grrrrrrgh!'.”
“I thought that maybe I could do it, too.”

“While a go, a man in black came and
said this as he went into the forest.”

Sephiroth
“Do not worry.
Soon the girl will become
part of the Planet's energy.”{PAUSE}“All that is left is to go North.
The 'Promised Land' waits
for me over the snowy fields.”

Sephiroth
“There, I will become a new being
by uniting with the Planet.
As will this girl……”

{Cloud}
“The cycle of nature and your
stupid plan don't mean a thing.”

{Cloud}
“{Aeris} is gone.”{PAUSE}“{Aeris} will no longer talk,
no longer laugh, cry…or get angry…”

{Cloud}
“What about us…what are WE supposed to do?”

{Cloud}
“My fingers are tingling.
My mouth is dry.
My eyes are burning!”

Sephiroth
“What are you saying?
Are you trying to tell me
you have feelings now?”

{Cloud}
“Of course!
What do you think I am!?”

Sephiroth
“Ha, ha, ha…
Stop acting as if you're sad.”{PAUSE}“And there's no need to act as if
you're angry either.”

{Cloud}
“I am {Cloud}, born in Nibelheim and
formerly of SOLDIER.”

{Cloud}
“I came here to settle up
with Sephiroth.”

{Cloud}
“I came here of my own will…
or at least that's what I thought.
But…”

{Cloud}
“To be honest…
I'm afraid of myself.”

{Cloud}
“There's a part of me I don't understand.”{PAUSE}“Like when I gave away the Black Materia.”

{Cloud}
“And if you all hadn't stopped me,
…{Aeris} might have…”

{Cloud}
“That is why, maybe I shouldn't
go on with this journey.”{PAUSE}“I may do something terrible.”

{Cloud}
“Five years ago, he burned down my hometown,
then he took {Aeris}.”{PAUSE}“And now he's trying to destroy the Planet……
I won't let him get away with it.”

{Cloud}
“But…I have a favor to ask of you.”

{Cloud}
“…Will you all still go with me?”

{Cloud}
“Please watch me so I
don't do anything horrible.”

{Cloud}
“I wonder how {Aeris} was going to save
this planet from Meteor.
We have no way of finding out now.”

{Cloud}
“We still have a chance.
We need to get the Black Materia back
before Sephiroth uses Meteor.”

Let's try and jump down
Let's not…

{Tifa}
“It's too late…
Marlene…{Barret}
…the people of the Slums.”

{Aeris}
“Don't give up, never give up hope.
It's not easy to destroy the pillar, right?”

{Cloud}
“There's a Shinra logo on it.
Tiny Bronco……
This is cool.”

{Barret}
“Shinra always keeps the
best things for themselves.
Let's take it!”

{Tifa}
“I wonder if we can borrow it…”

{Red XIII}
“Will it fly?
Is it all right to just take it?”

{Cait Sith}
“{Cloud}!
If we steal it, we'll get in deep trouble!”

{Yuffie}
“{Cloud}, let's steal it!
I love stealing from the Shinra!”

“…If you would like to use it,
please ask the Captain.
The Captain should be in the rocket.”

“I'm Shera.
And what are your names?”

Shera
“Hmm…
So you're not with the Shinra.”{PAUSE}“I thought you were bringing approval
for the Space Program.”

Shera
“President Rufus is scheduled to come here.
The Captain's been so restless all morning.”

Palmer
“Hmm…
Why do I have to do this…?
I'm the head of the Space Program…”

Palmer
“I know! The Shinra building!
When the President was killed! Ulp!”

Rufus
“{Cloud}!?
Don't let 'em get away!
Shoot 'em down!”

{Cid}
“This's gonna be a big splash.
Hold on to your drawers
and don't piss in 'em!”

{Cloud}
“Can't we use it as a boat?”

{Cid}
“I dunno.
I'm history with the Shinra
and I've given up on that town.”

{Cid}
“Wife? Don't make me laugh!
Just thinkin' 'bout marryin'
her gives me the chills.”

{Cloud}
“We're going after a man named Sephiroth.
We'll have to get Rufus
of the Shinra someday, too.”

{Cid}
“I don't know about any of that, but…”

{Cid}
“Yeah. Anyone stupid enough to go up against
Shinra nowadays, has GOTTA be a numbskull!
I like it!”

{Cid}
“So, where we headed?”{PAUSE}“Rufus was goin' after Sephiroth to
{CYAN}the Temple of the Ancients{WHITE}.”

{Cloud}
“Really!?…Where is it?
That {CYAN}Temple of the Ancients{WHITE}?”

{Cid}
“Dunno. That numbskull kid was tellin' me
he was headin 'The wrong direction'…
so maybe it's off this way?”

{Cloud}
“Let's just head for land and
get some information.
{CYAN}Temple of the Ancients{WHITE}…
that name bothers me.”

{Yuffie}
“…Hm.
How 'bout goin' west?”{PAUSE}“No, no reason.
NO reason at all!”
